description.p: A template for creating an app with a fly-in menu to select the active template in a UX component.

discussion.p: The *[ui:MobileAppFramework_FlyInMenu_to_select_Active_Panel]* template is a template with a [Panel Navigator], several [Panel Cards], and a [ControlBar] with a menu button that displays an [ExpandingMenu control]. The ExpandingMenu control is animated into view using the "fly-in" effect from the left-hand side of the screen.

description.p: This template is similar to the [MobileAppFramework_with_SplitView_ExpandingTreeMenu] template.
